title: account permernanty banned
body: 1. my account is permernanty banned why?. please return my account._____{{champion:68}} {{item:3056}} {{summoner:{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you [submitted a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) yet? They're the only ones who can help you with this issue further.

Have you received an email regarding the suspension? (Check your spam box)
